Name: Increased penalties for department of buildings violations issued to parking structures.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to increased penalties for department of buildings violations issued to parking structures

History.Description: This Resolution was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Housing and Buildings
This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm
This Introduction was Amended by Committee
This Introduction was Approved by Committee

Summary: This bill would double the standard civil penalties for Department of Buildings-enforced violations when issued to the owner of a parking structure.

Be it enacted by the Council as follows:\ulnone\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\sl480\slmult1\qj Section 1. Section 28-202.1 of the administrative code of the city of New York, as amended by local law number 126 for the year 2021, is amended by adding new exceptions 13 and 13.1 through 13.9 to read as follows:\par
\pard\ltrpar\li360\qj\ul 13. For a violation involving a parking structure, as defined in section 28-323.2:\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi360\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\li720\qj 13.1. The minimum civil penalty for a violation of section 28-204.4 shall be $2,500;\par
\par
13.2. The minimum civil penalty for an immediately hazardous violation of section 28-207.4.5 shall be $5,000;\par
\par
13.3. The minimum civil penalty for an immediately hazardous violation of section 28-211.1 shall be $20,000;\par
\par
13.4. The minimum civil penalty for a violation of section 28-217.1.1 shall be $1,600;\par
\par
13.5. The minimum civil penalty for a violation of section 28-217.1.6 shall be $5,000;\par
\par
13.6. The minimum civil penalty for an immediately hazardous violation of section 28-301.1 shall be $2,500 for a first violation and $5,000 for a second violation, in addition to any separate daily or monthly penalty imposed pursuant to item 1 of this section; \par
\par
13.7. The minimum civil penalty for an immediately hazardous violation of section 28-302.1 shall be $5,000 for a first violation and $7,500 for a second violation, in addition to any separate daily or monthly penalty imposed pursuant to item 1 of this section;\par
 \par
13.8. The minimum civil penalty for an immediately hazardous violation of section 28-302.3 shall be $5,000; and \par
\par
13.9. The minimum civil penalty for a violation of section 28-302.4 shall be $2,500.\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\sl480\slmult1\qj\ulnone\'a7 2. This local law takes effect 180 days after it becomes law, except that the commissioner of buildings shall take such measures as are necessary for the implementation of this local law, including the promulgation of rules, before such date.\par
